sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 288 of 2026, dated 27/Jan/2026, executed by M Mohammed Daulat Ali in favour of her Wife, M. Samreen Fathima, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 74 Sq Yrds.,, bearing house number 11-60, comprised in survey number 258/2, situated in Tungundram Village, Avalakonda Gramakantam, Tungundram Gram Panchayat, Gangadhara Nellore Mandal, within the District of Chittoor, registered at sub-registrar office Chittoor Rural, is bounded as follows: North by : House of Samreen Fathima South by: House of Ahammed Hussain East by: House of Sardar Ali West by: C.C.road Note: Schedule property is part of Gramakantam as per recitals of the deed.

It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or
Lease Deed

Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been veri ed using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-veri cation across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
